attributes.action: STOP THE PRESS FROM CALLING THE TERRORIST ''ISLAMIC STATE
attributes.additional_details: SKY NEWS BBC NEWS AND NEWSPAPERS
attributes.background: BY CALLING THEM ISLAMIC STATE IT SEEMS AS IF THEY ARE BECOMING A RECOGNIZED STATE AND THAT THEY WILL BE ACCEPTED BY OTHER STATES IN YEARS TO COME

rejection.details: This is a decision for the media, not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament.
